properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 18 at 3:19PM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 28 knots from the
southeast with gusts up to 36 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 11 feet with a potential maximum wave height of
16 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Huron from 5NM east of Mackinac Bridge to Presque
Isle Lt beyond 5 NM off shore, Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point
to Alabaster MI beyond 5NM off shore and Lake Huron from
Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Point MI beyond 5NM off shore.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 1 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 3 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY
